title: Microbe-material hybrids for therapeutic applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,8306-8378
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00655G, Review Article
Meng Chen, Lili Xia, Chenyao Wu, Zeyu Wang, Li Ding, Yujie Xie, Wei Feng, Yu Chen
Microorganisms can create microbe-material hybrids for biomedical uses like bioimaging, anti-tumor, antibacterial, and anti-inflammatory treatments. These hybrids hold promise for the development of next-gen nanomedicine and biomaterials.
